attributes.action: Stop Foreign 'Investors' Ruining Our Football Clubs..
attributes.additional_details:
A petition to force football club owners to respect the identity, history of the football clubs that they buy into and the fans that serve the club before they come, while they tinker and long after they are gone.

Make the Premier League/Football league consult with fans before changing identities...

Football clubs should not be some rich gits plaything.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the football authorities, but one where the government is encouraging better governance by the FA and others.
